title: VERBATIM: Fed to move gradually as economy picks up
text:
VERBATIM: Fed to move gradually as economy picks up 5:03pm GMT - 00:44 
New Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell told lawmakers he personally believed the economy has strengthened since December but that won't stop the Fed from sticking to its plan for gradual interest rate hikes. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
New Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell told lawmakers he personally believed the economy has strengthened since December but that won't stop the Fed from sticking to its plan for gradual interest rate hikes.
